description.zh-cn: 唐朝政治人物、宰相、诗人及历史学家。因在唐高宗废后立武事件中支持武则天而获得重用，官至右相。后因滥用权势、贪污受贿被流放巂州，最终忧愤而死。
description.en: A Tang dynasty politician, chancellor, poet, and historian. He was heavily relied upon for supporting Wu Zetian in the event of deposing Empress Wang and establishing Empress Wu, eventually rising to the position of Right Chancellor. He was later exiled to Cuizhou for abuse of power and corruption, where he died of grief and indignation.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝西城郡守，唐朝魏州刺史，李义府之父。
description.en: A governor of Xicheng Commandery in the Sui dynasty and a prefect of Weizhou in the Tang dynasty; father of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，曾任剑南道巡察大使，举荐了李义府。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who served as the Inspecting Commissioner of Jiannan Circuit and recommended Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中央政府三省之一，负责审议诏敕。
description.en: One of the Three Departments of the central government in the Tang dynasty, responsible for reviewing edicts and memorials.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，曾极力荐举李义府。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who strongly recommended Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，曾极力荐举李义府。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who strongly recommended Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，时任太子司议郎，与李义府文名齐名。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who served as Remonstrator for the Crown Prince and was as famous for his literary talent as Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 中国二十四史之一，记载晋朝历史的史书，李义府曾参与预撰。
description.en: One of the Twenty-Four Histories of China, an official history of the Jin dynasty; Li Yifu participated in its compilation.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年宰相、外戚，唐高宗的舅父，因厌恶李义府而建议将其贬官。
description.en: A chancellor and imperial relative by marriage in the early Tang dynasty, uncle of Emperor Gaozong. He disliked Li Yifu and recommended his demotion.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中书舍人，因与李义府交好，在其将被贬官时向其泄密。
description.en: A Palace Scribe of the Tang dynasty who was on good terms with Li Yifu and secretly informed him when he was about to be demoted.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗的第一任皇后，后被废黜。
description.en: The first empress consort of Emperor Gaozong of Tang, who was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗的第二任皇后，后成为中国历史上唯一的女皇帝。
description.en: The second empress consort of Emperor Gaozong of Tang, who later became the only female emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝大理丞，与李义府勾结释放女囚，事败后自杀。
description.en: An Assistant Minister of Justice in the Tang dynasty who colluded with Li Yifu to release a female prisoner. He committed suicide after the plot was exposed.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝御史，曾上书弹劾李义府，反被其仗势贬逐出京。
description.en: A Censor in the Tang dynasty who submitted a memorial to impeach Li Yifu but was instead exiled from the capital by Li's power.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝阴阳师，曾蛊惑李义府。
description.en: A Tang dynasty occultist who deluded Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝右金吾仓曹参军，曾告发李义府图谋不轨。
description.en: An Adjutant in the Granary Section of the Right Jinwu Guard in the Tang dynasty who accused Li Yifu of harboring treacherous intentions.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝司刑太常伯（刑部尚书），负责审理李义府一案。
description.en: A Tang dynasty Minister of Justice (Sixing Taichangbo) who was responsible for trying Li Yifu's case.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年名将、宰相，时任司空，负责监审李义府一案。
description.en: A famous general and chancellor of the early Tang dynasty who served as Minister of Works and supervised the trial of Li Yifu's case.

description.zh-cn: 唐代州名，治所在今四川西昌。李义府被流放于此并在此去世。
description.en: A prefecture in the Tang dynasty, with its seat in modern-day Xichang, Sichuan. Li Yifu was exiled to and died in this place.

description.zh-cn: 李义府所著文集，已佚失。
description.en: A collection of writings by Li Yifu, now lost.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝，曾下令停止授予李义府等六家后裔的实封。
description.en: The fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty, who ordered the cessation of the fiefs granted to the descendants of Li Yifu and five other families.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，与李义府同为支持武则天为后的官员，后一同被追赠官爵。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang dynasty who, along with Li Yifu, supported Wu Zetian's ascension to empress and was later posthumously honored alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，与李义府同为支持武则天为后的官员，后一同被追赠官爵。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who, along with Li Yifu, supported Wu Zetian's ascension to empress and was later posthumously honored alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，与李义府同为支持武则天为后的官员，后一同被追赠官爵。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who, along with Li Yifu, supported Wu Zetian's ascension to empress and was later posthumously honored alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，与李义府同为支持武则天为后的官员，后一同被追赠官爵。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official who, along with Li Yifu, supported Wu Zetian's ascension to empress and was later posthumously honored alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，李义府之子。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official, son of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，李义府之子。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official, son of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，李义府之子。
description.en: A Tang dynasty official, son of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝将领，李义府之子。
description.en: A Tang dynasty general, son of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 武周时期官员，李义府之子。
description.en: An official during the Wu Zhou period, son of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝少府主簿，李义府的女婿。
description.en: A Director in the Directorate for Imperial Manufactories of the Tang dynasty, son-in-law of Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 李义府之女，柳元贞之妻。
description.en: Daughter of Li Yifu and wife of Liu Yuanzhen.

description.zh-cn: 贞观八年（634年），李大亮举荐李义府补门下省典仪。
description.en: In 634, Li Daliang recommended Li Yifu for the position of Usher in the Chancellery.

description.zh-cn: 刘洎曾极力荐举李义府，使其得以任监察御史。
description.en: Liu Ji strongly recommended Li Yifu, which led to his appointment as an Investigating Censor.

description.zh-cn: 马周曾极力荐举李义府，使其得以任监察御史。
description.en: Ma Zhou strongly recommended Li Yifu, which led to his appointment as an Investigating Censor.

description.zh-cn: 李义府曾奉太子之命参与预撰《晋书》。
description.en: Li Yifu was ordered by the Crown Prince to participate in the compilation of the Book of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 永徽六年（655年），李义府被太尉长孙无忌厌恶。
description.en: In 655, Li Yifu was disliked by the Grand Marshal Zhangsun Wuji.

description.zh-cn: 永徽六年（655年），长孙无忌上疏建言将李义府贬为壁州司马。
description.en: In 655, Zhangsun Wuji submitted a memorial recommending the demotion of Li Yifu to be the Sima of Bizhou.

description.zh-cn: 王德俭因与李义府交好，在其将被贬官时向其密告。
description.en: Because he was on good terms with Li Yifu, Wang Dejian secretly informed him when he was about to be demoted.

description.zh-cn: 为求自救，李义府率先支持废王皇后立武则天为皇后。
description.en: In order to save himself, Li Yifu took the lead in supporting the deposition of Empress Wang and the installation of Wu Zetian as empress.

description.zh-cn: 李义府支持废黜王皇后，以武则天取而代之。
description.en: Li Yifu supported the deposition of Empress Wang to be replaced by Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 李义府因支持立武则天为后而得到唐高宗的重视和提拔。
description.en: Because he supported making Wu Zetian the empress, Li Yifu gained the favor and promotion of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 御史王义方因李义府勾结毕正义、私纳情妇一事而上书弹劾他。
description.en: Censor Wang Yifang submitted a memorial to impeach Li Yifu for colluding with Bi Zhengyi and taking a mistress.

description.zh-cn: 在被王义方弹劾后，李义府仗势将其贬逐出京。
description.en: After being impeached by Wang Yifang, Li Yifu used his power to have Wang exiled from the capital.

description.zh-cn: 龙朔三年（663年），右金吾仓曹参军杨行颖告发李义府“窥觇灾眚，阴怀异图”。
description.en: In 663, Yang Xingying, an Adjutant in the Granary Section of the Right Jinwu Guard, accused Li Yifu of 'observing calamities and secretly harboring treacherous intentions'.

description.zh-cn: 刘祥道负责审理杨行颖对李义府的指控。
description.en: Liu Xiangdao was responsible for trying the case based on Yang Xingying's accusations against Li Yifu.

description.zh-cn: 由于李义府权势过大，司空李𪟝负责监审其案。
description.en: Due to Li Yifu's great power, Minister of Works Li Ji supervised the trial of his case.

description.zh-cn: 龙朔三年（663年）底，唐高宗下令将李义府全家长流巂州。干封元年（666年），高宗大赦天下，但特别下令长流人不得返还，导致李义府忧愤而死。
description.en: At the end of 663, Emperor Gaozong ordered the exile of Li Yifu's entire family to Cuizhou. In 666, Gaozong granted a general amnesty but specifically excluded those in long-term exile from returning, causing Li Yifu to die of grief and indignation.

description.zh-cn: 武则天以李义府在永徽年间有辅佐之功为由，于692年追赠其扬州大都督，并于701年赐其后裔实封。
description.en: Citing Li Yifu's contributions during the Yonghui era, Wu Zetian posthumously awarded him the title of Grand Area Commander of Yangzhou in 692 and granted his descendants a fief in 701.

description.zh-cn: 景云元年（710年），唐睿宗下令停止授予李义府等六家后裔的实封。
description.en: In 710, Emperor Ruizong ordered the cessation of the fiefs granted to the descendants of Li Yifu and five other families.

description.zh-cn: 李义府在任太子舍人期间，其文名与时任太子司议郎的来济齐名。
description.en: During his tenure as an Attendant to the Crown Prince, Li Yifu's literary reputation was on par with that of Lai Ji, who was then the Remonstrator for the Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 李义府著有《宦游记》二十卷。
description.en: Li Yifu authored the twenty-volume work 'Huanyou Ji'.
